gasContract.terms: For full terms and conditions applicable to this offer, please visit https://www.redenergy.com.au/terms
gasContract.variation: We may vary your rates in line with our Terms and Conditions and in accordance with the Relevant Laws. We will give you written notice of at least 5 business days prior to the variation.

incentives.eligibility: Get 5,000 bonus Qantas Points when Red Energy becomes responsible for the supply of your electricity and 3 Qantas Points per $1 on every gas bill, when you pay on time. For T&Cs see redenergy.com.au/terms

Carbon Neutral Gas is certified by Climate Active and is an optional add-on charged at an additional rate of 0.242 cents per MJ inc GST and may be varied or ended by notice under relevant laws. See www.redenergy.com.au/carbon-neutral-gas

eligibility.information: Only available to Qantas Red business customers who are nominated as a Director or Authorised Person on a Qantas Red business plan who are also an account holder on a Qantas Red residential premises.

gasContract.onExpiryDescription: Your contract is ongoing until it is ended by you or us.
